title: Atelier Firis: The Alchemist and the Mysterious Journey – v1.0.0.9 + 2 DLCs
body:
Atelier Firis: The Alchemist and the Mysterious Journey – v1.0.0.9 + 2 DLCs


Genres/Tags: RPG, Third-person, 3D, Japanese
Companies: Gust / Tecmo Koei
Languages: ENG/JAP
Original Size: 17 GB
Repack Size: from 7 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Atelier.Firis.The.Alchemist.and.the.Mysterious.Journey-CODEX ISO release: codex-atelier.firis.the.alchemist.and.the.mysterious.journey.iso (16,604,594,176 bytes)
  • Atelier.Firis.The.Alchemist.and.the.Mysterious.Journey.Update.0.Incl.DLC-3DM (1.5 GB) added
  • 2 DLCs activated Costume: Resort Vacation, Wonderland & Atelier series special BGM pack; activated after first cave mission finished
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing Japanese localization (make sure NOT to switch to it in-game if you don’t install those files)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 17 to 7~9 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 10-30 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 22 GB
  • Repack uses pZlib library by Razor12911

Game Description

The second entry in the ‘Mysterious’ saga follows the adventures of the enthusiastic Firis Mistlud and her loving older sister Liane Mistlud.

The sisters have lived their entire lives in the isolated town of Ertona, where Firis uses her unique ability to see where crystals of materials are buried. By way of a fateful encounter, Firis learns of the Alchemy Exam and decides to take her first step into the outside world, setting off on a grand journey to become a certified alchemist and discover the mysteries that life has to offer!

Experience a vast world with towns, environments and other locations!
